WESTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
BRAZIL-NORTH COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY 25 JUL THRU 15 AUG BY
   M/V OCEAN ENDEAVOUR IN AREA BOUND BY
   05-29.28N 049-46.37W, 05-14.00N 049-30.28W
   04-31.33N 050-07.80W, 04-47.23N 050-24.05W
   WIDE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 1714/14.
3. CANCEL THIS MSG 16 AUG 14.
